description: Google Tasks MCP Server - A bridge between Claude and Google Tasks that allows you to manage your task lists and tasks directly through Claude. Requires Google Cloud Project with Tasks API enabled and OAuth2 authentication. Built with TypeScript and provides comprehensive task management functionality.

tools.name: authenticate
tools.description: Initialize the authentication flow and get an authorization URL for Google Tasks API access.

tools.name: set-auth-code
tools.description: Complete the authentication process by providing the authorization code received from Google OAuth2 flow.

tools.name: list-tasklists
tools.description: Retrieve and list all your Google Tasks task lists with their details and metadata.

tools.name: get-tasklist
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific task list by its ID, including title and other properties.

tools.name: create-tasklist
tools.description: Create a new task list in Google Tasks with a specified title and optional description.

tools.name: update-tasklist
tools.description: Update an existing task list's properties such as title or other metadata.

tools.name: delete-tasklist
tools.description: Permanently delete a task list and all its contained tasks from Google Tasks.

tools.name: list-tasks
tools.description: List all tasks within a specific task list, including their status, due dates, and hierarchical structure.

tools.name: get-task
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific task by its ID, including notes, due dates, and completion status.

tools.name: create-task
tools.description: Create a new task in a specified task list with title, notes, due date, and other properties.

tools.name: update-task
tools.description: Update an existing task's properties such as title, notes, due date, status, or parent task.

tools.name: delete-task
tools.description: Permanently delete a specific task from Google Tasks.

tools.name: complete-task
tools.description: Mark a task as completed, updating its status and completion timestamp.

tools.name: move-task
tools.description: Move a task within a list to reorder it or change its parent task for hierarchical organization.

tools.name: clear-completed-tasks
tools.description: Remove all completed tasks from a specified task list to clean up the list.
